grids.name: grdBargeList
grids.purpose: Display list of barges associated with event

toolbarButtons.purpose: Modify barge details for multiple barges

rules.rule: Required for Complete Load/Unload events when CommodityIsRequiredForLoadUnload global setting is True
rules.message: Commodity is required for completed load/unload events
Start date and time are required

rules.rule: At least one barge required for most event types
rules.message: At least one barge must be added to the event

eventHandlers.btnSubmit_Click: Validates and saves the event, then closes the form
eventHandlers.btnCancel_Click: Closes the form without saving changes
eventHandlers.btnDelays_Click: Opens the delays dialog for event
eventHandlers.btnDraftDetail_Click: Opens draft detail dialog for entering draft measurements
eventHandlers.btnAddToList_Click: Adds selected barge to the event
eventHandlers.cboVendorID_ValueChanged: Updates billing panel when vendor changes
eventHandlers.cboToLocationID_ValueChanged: Updates related fields based on location selection
eventHandlers.cboFromLocationID_ValueChanged: Updates related fields based on location selection
eventHandlers.cboDestinationID_ValueChanged: Updates related fields based on destination
eventHandlers.optChargeType_ValueChanged: Recalculates billing based on charge type selection
eventHandlers.cboDestinationType_ValueChanged: Repopulates destination combo based on type
eventHandlers.cboFromLocationType_ValueChanged: Repopulates from location combo based on type
eventHandlers.cboToLocationType_ValueChanged: Repopulates to location combo based on type

businessLogicNotes: Form implements IBaseDetailEdit interface for standard detail form behavior
Complex event type logic determines which fields are visible/required
EventTypeEnumVal drives much of the form's behavior (Terminal, Onboard, Towing, Freight)
Billing calculations are complex with base rates, surcharges, and escalations
Location combos dynamically populate based on type selection (Boat vs Facility)
Multiple consignment scenarios supported (to ship, stockpile, truck/train ticket)
Draft can be entered in feet/inches or calculated from tonnage
Freight billing has separate calculation logic from main billing
Form supports multi-shift onboard orders with complex validation
Access level checks separate for billing vs non-billing tabs
dataAccessPatterns: BargeEvent business object manages all event data
ModifyBargeDetails class handles batch updates to multiple barges
Multiple list population methods for dynamic combos
Billing calculations may involve rate lookups from multiple tables
modernizationNotes: ALL datetime fields use split date/time inputs with 24-hour military time
Replace Infragistics UltraCombo with Select2 for searchable dropdowns
Replace UltraGrid with DataTables for server-side processing
Consider breaking this massive form into multiple focused views
Tabs could become separate routes or modal dialogs
Complex billing logic should move to backend API
Real-time validation should use Fluent Validation
Consider using AJAX for dynamic combo population
File upload (attachment) should use modern drag-drop component
Toolbar buttons should become standard Bootstrap buttons or action menu
